description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use Rundll32 in Scripts Author: Nikita Nazarov, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use Rundll32
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4697" AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*\&&* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*rundll32* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*shell32.dll* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*shellexec_rundll* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:(*value* OR *invoke* OR *comspec* OR *iex*))
